name: HTMLTableElement.insertRow
description: The HTMLTableElement.insertRow() method inserts a new row (tr) in a given table, and returns a reference to the new row.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLTableElement.insertRow()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
